SEARCH
Package pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object

Piece Interface

This class outlines a Piece interface, which will be implemented by the different types of Pieces. The getter / setter / Piece object are defined, while the getName and getMoves methods are abstract. Basic method checkMovement is defined.
Since:
2022-10-13

      public Board board

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece(boolean side, int rowNum, int colLet, Board board)
      Implements the parameters side, rowNum, colLet, and board to create a standard chess piece.
      Parameters:
      side - The player of the curren turn's board side.
      rowNum - The y coordinate of the current location
      colLet - The x coordinate of the current location
      board - The 2D pieces array board.

  • Method Details

    • setNewCoords

      public void setNewCoords(int rowNum, int colLet)
      Sets the new integer coordinates of the Piece
      Parameters:
      rowNum - the row number
      colLet - the column number

    • checkMovement

      public boolean checkMovement(int xCoord, int yCoord, boolean side)
      Performs a basic movement check on the piece to see if the destination is within board parameters, and doesn't collide with a piece on the same side.
      Parameters:
      xCoord - the column coordinate of the destination
      yCoord - the row coordinate of the destination
      side - the current turn's side.
      Returns:
      if the movement is valid.

    • getName

      public abstract String getName()
      Name getter method to be implemented by subclasses.
      Returns:
      String of the current Piece's name.

    • getMoves

      public abstract ArrayList<String> getMoves()
      Gets all possible moves for the current Piece, to be implemented by the subclasses.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all possible moves.
